AddDownloadClientToProwlarr: Adding a download client allows {appName} to send releases direct from the UI while doing a manual search.
AdvancedSettingsHiddenClickToShow: Advanced settings hidden, click to show
AdvancedSettingsShownClickToHide: Advanced settings shown, click to hide
AllIndexersHiddenDueToFilter: All indexers are hidden due to applied filter.
AnalyticsEnabledHelpText: Send anonymous usage and error information to {appName}'s servers. This includes information on your browser, which {appName} WebUI pages you use, error reporting as well as OS and runtime version. We will use this information to prioritize features and bug fixes.
ApiKeyValidationHealthCheckMessage: Please update your API key to be at least {0} characters long. You can do this via settings or the config file
AppDataLocationHealthCheckMessage: Updating will not be possible to prevent deleting AppData on Update
AppProfileSelectHelpText: App profiles are used to control RSS, Automatic Search and Interactive Search settings on application sync
AppSettingsSummary: Applications and settings to configure how {appName} interacts with your PVR programs
AppUpdatedVersion: {appName} has been updated to version `{version}`, in order to get the latest changes you'll need to reload {appName}
ApplicationLongTermStatusCheckAllClientM: All applications are unavailable due to failures for more than 6 hours
ApplicationLongTermStatusCheckSingleClie: Applications unavailable due to failures for more than 6 hours: {0}
ApplicationSettingsSyncRejectBlocklisted: Sync Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing

If a torrent is blocked by hash it may not properly be rejected during RSS/Search for some indexers, enabling this will allow it to be rejected after the torrent is grabbed, but before it is sent to the client.
ApplicationStatusCheckAllClientMessage: All applications are unavailable due to failures
ApplicationTagsHelpText: Sync Indexers to this application that have one or more matching tags. If no tags are listed here, then no indexers will be prevented from syncing due to their tags.
ApplicationTagsHelpTextWarning: Tags should be used with caution, they can have unintended effects. An app with a tag will only sync with indexers having the same tag.

ApplyTagsHelpTextReplace: Replace: Replace the tags with the entered tags (enter no tags to clear all tags)

DownloadClientAriaSettingsDirectoryHelpT: Optional location to put downloads in, leave blank to use the default Aria2 location
DownloadClientDelugeSettingsUrlBaseHelpT: Adds a prefix to the deluge json url, see {url}
DownloadClientDownloadStationSettingsDir: Optional shared folder to put downloads into, leave blank to use the default Download Station location
DownloadClientFloodSettingsAdditionalTag: Adds properties of media as tags. Hints are examples.
DownloadClientFloodSettingsTagsHelpText: Initial tags of a download. To be recognized, a download must have all initial tags. This avoids conflicts with unrelated downloads.
DownloadClientFloodSettingsUrlBaseHelpTe: Adds a prefix to the Flood API, such as {url}
DownloadClientFreeboxSettingsApiUrlHelpT: Define Freebox API base URL with API version, eg '{url}', defaults to '{defaultApiUrl}'
DownloadClientFreeboxSettingsAppIdHelpTe: App ID given when creating access to Freebox API (ie 'app_id')
DownloadClientFreeboxSettingsAppTokenHel: App token retrieved when creating access to Freebox API (ie 'app_token')
DownloadClientFreeboxSettingsHostHelpTex: Hostname or host IP address of the Freebox, defaults to '{url}' (will only work if on same network)
DownloadClientFreeboxSettingsPortHelpTex: Port used to access Freebox interface, defaults to '{port}'
DownloadClientNzbgetSettingsAddPausedHel: This option requires at least NzbGet version 16.0
DownloadClientPneumaticSettingsNzbFolder: This folder will need to be reachable from XBMC
DownloadClientPneumaticSettingsStrmFolde: .strm files in this folder will be import by drone
DownloadClientPriorityHelpText: Prioritize multiple Download Clients. Round-Robin is used for clients with the same priority.
DownloadClientQbittorrentSettingsContent: Whether to use qBittorrent's configured content layout, the original layout from the torrent or always create a subfolder (qBittorrent 4.3.2+)
DownloadClientQbittorrentSettingsFirstAn: Download first and last pieces first (qBittorrent 4.1.0+)
DownloadClientQbittorrentSettingsInitial: Initial state for torrents added to qBittorrent. Note that Forced Torrents do not abide by seed restrictions
DownloadClientQbittorrentSettingsUseSslH: Use a secure connection. See Options -> Web UI -> 'Use HTTPS instead of HTTP' in qBittorrent.
DownloadClientRTorrentSettingsAddStopped: Enabling will add torrents and magnets to rTorrent in a stopped state. This may break magnet files.
DownloadClientRTorrentSettingsDirectoryH: Optional location to put downloads in, leave blank to use the default rTorrent location
DownloadClientRTorrentSettingsUrlPathHel: Path to the XMLRPC endpoint, see {url}. This is usually RPC2 or [path to ruTorrent]{url2} when using ruTorrent.
DownloadClientSettingsDefaultCategoryHel: Default fallback category if no mapped category exists for a release. Adding a category specific to {appName} avoids conflicts with unrelated non-{appName} downloads. Using a category is optional, but strongly recommended.
DownloadClientSettingsDefaultCategorySub: Default fallback category if no mapped category exists for a release. Adding a category specific to {appName} avoids conflicts with unrelated non-{appName} downloads. Using a category is optional, but strongly recommended. Creates a [category] subdirectory in the output directory.
DownloadClientSettingsDestinationHelpTex: Manually specifies download destination, leave blank to use the default
DownloadClientSettingsInitialStateHelpTe: Initial state for torrents added to {clientName}
DownloadClientSettingsPriorityItemHelpTe: Priority to use when grabbing items
DownloadClientSettingsUrlBaseHelpText: Adds a prefix to the {clientName} url, such as {url}
DownloadClientSettingsUseSslHelpText: Use secure connection when connection to {clientName}
DownloadClientStatusCheckAllClientMessag: All download clients are unavailable due to failures
DownloadClientStatusCheckSingleClientMes: Download clients unavailable due to failures: {0}
DownloadClientTransmissionSettingsDirect: Optional location to put downloads in, leave blank to use the default Transmission location
DownloadClientTransmissionSettingsUrlBas: Adds a prefix to the {clientName} rpc url, eg {url}, defaults to '{defaultUrl}'
DownloadClientsSettingsSummary: Download clients configuration for integration into {appName} UI search

EnableInteractiveSearchHelpText: Will be used when interactive search is used

SyncLevelAddRemove: Add and Remove Only: When indexers are added or removed from {appName}, it will update this remote app.
SyncLevelFull: Full Sync: Will keep this app's indexers fully in sync. Changes made to indexers in {appName} are then synced to this app. Any change made to indexers remotely within this app will be overridden by {appName} on the next sync.
